ingredients: 2 pounds chicken thighs (boneless and skinless), cut into bite-sized pieces
½ cup coconut cream (refrigerate can of coconut milk overnight and use the cream on top of the can or use ½ cup of this coconut cream)
2 tablespoons Grassfed Organic Ghee (add more if needed)
1 green bell pepper, chopped in large pieces
1 can organic coconut milk, full fat
1 teaspoon Kashmiri chili powder (if using cayenne, use a little less)
